title: Welcome to the Pixel Community Forum!
content:
Welcome to the new Pixel Community Forum!

This Community is specifically for people who want to discuss or ask questions about the Pixel phone - visit here to see our current offerings in the Google Store.
Before asking a question, be sure to search the Help Center using the search bar above
Pixel Buds is moving to its own community here!

We also have a set of guidelines though to govern the discussion–which can be found in their entirety here–but I’ll also include some below:
Create topics and posts related to the community’s subject
Choose the most appropriate category for your topics  (make sure to let us know what device you are using! )
Create clear and concise topic subjects and posts
Do not include personal information

In addition, posts must not contain the following types of content: Spam, nudity and sexually explicit material, violent or bullying behavior, hate speech, impersonation, private and confidential information, or copyrighted content

As a general guiding principle to the above, be sure to keep discussions respectful and constructive.

Thanks for helping make this a Community for all,
Erin B. | Pixel Community Manager
